00019 public class OracleDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00020     public static final String PRODUCT_NAME = "oracle";
00021 
00022     public void setConnection(Connection conn) {
00023         try {
00024             Method method = conn.getClass().getMethod("setRemarksReporting", Boolean.TYPE);
00025             method.setAccessible(true);
00026             method.invoke(conn, true);
00027         } catch (Exception e) {
00028             log.info("Could not set remarks reporting on OracleDatabase: "+e.getMessage());
00029             ; //cannot set it. That is OK
00030         }
00031         super.setConnection(conn);
00032     }
00033

00087     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00088         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00089     }

00091     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00092         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:oracle")) {
00093             return "oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver";
00094         }
00095         return null;
00096     }

00112         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().toUpperCase();

00127     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00128         String normalLiteral = super.getDateLiteral(isoDate);
00129 
00130         if (isDateOnly(isoDate)) {
00131             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00132             val.append("to_date(");
00133             val.append(normalLiteral);
00134             val.append(", 'YYYY-MM-DD')");
00135             return val.toString();
00136         } else if (isTimeOnly(isoDate)) {
00137             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00138             val.append("to_date(");
00139             val.append(normalLiteral);
00140             val.append(", 'HH24:MI:SS')");
00141             return val.toString();
00142         } else if (isDateTime(isoDate)) {
00143             normalLiteral = normalLiteral.substring(0, normalLiteral.lastIndexOf('.'))+"'";
00144 
00145             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer(26);
00146             val.append("to_date(");
00147             val.append(normalLiteral);
00148             val.append(", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')");
00149             return val.toString();
00150         } else {
00151             return "UNSUPPORTED:" + isoDate;
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155     public SqlStatement getSelectChangeLogLockSQL() throws JDBCException {
00156         return new RawSqlStatement((super.getSelectChangeLogLockSQL().getSqlStatement(this) + " for update").toUpperCase());
00157     }
00158 
00159     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00160         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQUENCE_NAME FROM ALL_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_OWNER = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "'");
00161     }
00162 
00163 
00164     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00165         if (super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)) {
00166             return true;
00167         } else if (tableName.startsWith("BIN$")) { //oracle deleted table
00168             return true;
00169         } else if (tableName.startsWith("AQ$")) { //oracle AQ tables
00170             return true;
00171         } else if (tableName.startsWith("DR$")) { //oracle index tables
00172             return true;
00173         }
00174         return false;
00175     }
00176     
00177     public boolean shouldQuoteValue(String value) {
00178         return super.shouldQuoteValue(value)
00179             && !value.startsWith("to_date(")
00180             && !value.equalsIgnoreCase(getCurrentDateTimeFunction());
00181     }

00184         return true;

00187     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00188         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT TEXT FROM ALL_VIEWS WHERE upper(VIEW_NAME)='"+name.toUpperCase()+"' AND OWNER='"+convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName)+"'" );
00189     }

00191     public boolean supportsAutoIncrement() {
00192         return false;
00193     }

00195     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00196         if (defaultValue != null) {
00197             if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00198                 if (dataType == Types.DATE || dataType == Types.TIME || dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00199                     if (((String) defaultValue).indexOf("YYYY-MM-DD HH") > 0) {
00200                         defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^to_date\\('","").replaceFirst("', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'\\)$","");
00201                     } else if (((String) defaultValue).indexOf("YYYY-MM-DD") > 0) {
00202                         defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^to_date\\('","").replaceFirst("', 'YYYY-MM-DD'\\)$","");
00203                     } else {
00204                         defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^to_date\\('","").replaceFirst("', 'HH24:MI:SS'\\)$","");
00205                     }
00206                 }
00207                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("'\\s*$", "'"); //sometimes oracle adds an extra space after the trailing ' (see http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1824663&group_id=187970&atid=923443).  
00208             }
00209         }
00210         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00211     }

00233     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00234         return new OracleDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00235     }
